snippet: At first they were happy and played in the snow, until they saw it was so cold and it was a dangerous sugar for them. A sugar from the sky, but it kills.
abstract: At first they were happy and played in the snow, until they saw it was so cold and it was a dangerous sugar for them. A sugar from the sky, but it kills.

headline.main: Winter at an Afghan Refugee Camp: 'Is It Sugar From God?'
